task_intent.title: 054-extract-duplicated-loadingstate-and-api-config-in-
task_intent.description: The analytics-dashboard has 4 widget components (PredictionWidget, AnomalyWidget, InsightWidget, QueryInterface) that each independently define the same LoadingState type and API_BASE_URL constant. This pattern is repeated across 7+ files when including tests, leading to maintenance burden and potential inconsistencies.
